Minidplyr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Select variable

select2.Rd

Select variable from a data frame

select2(df, ind)

Arguments

df

A data frame
ind

Indices as integer, logical or character vector.

Value

A subsetted data frame

Examples

select2(iris, 1:3)
#>     Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length
